files.name: README.md
files.content: ## Notice: Mintify Writer is no longer being updated by the Mintlify Team. Get started with our customer documentation product [here](mintlify.com/start). # ‚úçÔ∏è Mintlify Writer ![Ratings](https://img.shields.io/visual-studio-marketplace/r/mintlify.document) [![discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/911693009253466123?logo=Discord&logoColor=white)](https://discord.gg/6W7GuYuxra) [![GitHub Stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/mintlify/vscode-docs?style=social)](https://github.com/mintlify/vscode-docs) [![Twitter](https://img.shields.io/twitter/follow/mintlify?style=social)](https://twitter.com/mintlify) Writing documentation sucks. Let Mintlify take care of it. Just highlight code and see the magic. [![Demo](vscode/assets/demo-docs.gif)](https://www.loom.com/embed/3dbfcd7e0e1b47519d957746e05bf0f4) ### üë©‚Äçüíª How to generate documentation **Step 1** Highlight code or place cursor on the line you want to document **Step 2** Click on the `Write Docs` button (or hit ‚åò + .) ### üìù Languages supported - Python - JavaScript - TypeScript - JSX and TSX files - C and C++ - PHP - Java - C# - Ruby - Rust - Dart - Go - üöß More under construction ### üìë Docstring formats supported - JSDoc - reST - NumPy - DocBlock - Doxygen - Javadoc - GoDoc - XML - Google - üöß More under construction ### üö® Disclaimer We never store your code, but your code does leave your machine. --- ### More information [Website](https://mintlify.com/) [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mintlify) _Built with üíö by the Mintlify team_

files.name: package.json
prettier.config.js
files.content:
module.exports = {
  singleQuote: true,
  printWidth: 100,
  trailingComma: 'es5',
  arrowParens: 'always',
  tabWidth: 2,
  useTabs: false,
  quoteProps: 'as-needed',
  jsxSingleQuote: false,
  bracketSpacing: true,
  bracketSameLine: false,
};
